item.title: 4. Transactions
item.description: tour/transactions/queries.sql {{ define "schema" }} CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, author_id INTEGER REFERENCES authors(id), added_at DATE NOT NULL ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS authors ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT UNIQUE ); {{ end }} {{ define "upsert_author" }} INSERT INTO authors (name) VALUES ({{ .Author }}) ON CONFLICT (name) DO UPDATE SET id = authors.id RETURNING id; {{ end }} {{ define "insert_book" }} INSERT INTO books (title, author_id, added_at) VALUES ({{ .
